description:
Remote control for Squeezebox music players. Control your SqueezeBox players from your Touchpad.

This app controls Squeezebox players connected to a Squeezebox Server or MySqueezebox.com (including the server in the SqueezeBox Touch). Replicates almost every function of a Squeezebox Controller with an interface optimize for the Touchpad.

Requirements: Logitech Media Server (formerly Squeezebox Server) version 7.5 or better (tested with versions up to 7.7.2). For the Squeezebox Touch server (TinySBS), tested w/ 7.6.1. Use the latest version if you plan on using MySqueezebox.com too. A MySqueezebox.com account is required if you don't use a Logitech Media Server. You can create one from within the app or on the website. And of course Squeezebox players to control.   

Notes:
Make sure wifi is enabled on your Touchpad. Tested with the Squeezebox Receiver,  Boom, Touch, & Radio.

v2.1.3
- Change how some non-local cover artwork is retrieved, which may speed up some lists.
- Minor tweaks to how the menus worked
- [Bug Fixed] Certain items on the favorites menu could not be deleted.
- [Bug Fixed] Default background darkness slider did not work after disconnecting.

v2.1.2
- Minor internal changes.

v2.1.1
- Tap and holding the player name area in the control bar will now pop up a player selector.
- The sorting and tile size menus in Jukebox View will now indicate the selected item.
- [Bug Fixed] Some icons were not appearing in the MyApps list.
- [Bug Fixed] Popup selectors in Settings were positioned lower than they should be.
